data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fery, Hans, Erman, Ömer Köksal (2009): Five new species of the longulus - group of Hydroporus Clairville, 1806 from north-eastern Turkey (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae). Zootaxa 2033: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186322
